Detailed Description

ICSS-EMAC firmware configuration file which contain initializtion values for static configuration parameters (read only) and dynamic configuration parameters (read/write)

Function Documentation

int32_t icss_emacGetFwMMapInitConfig ( uint32_t  instance,
ICSS_EmacFwStaticMmap **  ppStaticMMap,
ICSS_EmacFwDynamicMmap **  ppDynamicMMap 
)

This API gets the ICSS-EMAC firmware Memory Map intial configuration.

Parameters
[in]instancePRU-ICSS instance
[in]ppStaticMMapAddress of pointer to be set to static MMap configuration structure.
[in]ppDynamicMMapAddress of pointer to be set to dynamic MMap configuration structure.
Returns
0 success: -1: error
int32_t icss_emacSetFwMMapInitConfig ( ICSS_EmacHandle  icssEmacHandle,
uint32_t  instance,
ICSS_EmacFwStaticMmap *  staticCfg,
ICSS_EmacFwDynamicMmap *  dynamicCfg 
)

This API sets the ICSS-EMAC firmware Memory Map intial configuration, this API MUST be called prior to calling ICSS_EmacInit()

Parameters
[in]icssEmacHandlehandle to ICSS_EMAC Instance
[in]instancePRU-ICSS instance
[in]staticCfgPointer to ICSS-EMAC firmware Memory Map initial static config.
[in]dynamicCfgPointer to ICSS-EMAC firmware Memory Map initial dynamic config.
Returns
0 success: -1: error
